channel.description:
[size=18pt][font=comic sans ms][center][b]NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP NEW IP...77.111.238.223:25565...NEW IP WEBSITE: [url=http://outopiamcserver.webs.com]click here[/url] FACEBOOK site: Minecraft Outopia Server
VOTE FOR US AND YOU WILL GET DIAMONDS INGAME..!! THE SERVER IS RUNNING 1.3.2 BUKKIT.. Warning: The server will tend to have Lag cause its a dev build! General things about the server! The server was setup up about 2 months ago.. The idea of making a server was firstly came up when 3 guys decided to make a LAN server to play minecraft together. One day, 1 guy of the 3 recommended making the server public for all. The idea was greatful so they start upgrading the server,they gave it a name..OUTOPIA.. The Outopia Server was a dream that became true for these guys. ''Tons'' of work by them made a fabulous place for all the minecrafters...The server is still improving and attract more and more people..!! Some Plugins that we use! -CookieMonster: Mobs drop more stuff! -WorldGuard: Fires don't spread, lava doesn't start fires, etc... -CreativeGates: Warp gates, prettier than Sortal.- -Essentials: Thousand of usefull and new commands waiting for you!! -LogBlock: To find those nasty griefers.. -ChestShop: Shops allocated around the map to buy whatever you want! -Jobs: Take a job and earn MILLIONS!! -Factions: Make your 'clan'..invite others...and start wars..!! And more more that you will find when you join...! Staff and website! All staff recruited for Outopia have to pass a series of applications and interviews in order to make the cut. Any staff caught giving the player a hard time, wielding there power megalomaniac style or just simply not doing their job, will be dealt with in a fair manner.
Our website contains everything you need to know about the server. It also offers active forums for the players to sink their teeth into and get to know other members. The website is also the hub for all latest news, comps and events.
If you have questions or comments please let us know by typing a comment below | | | V.[/b][/center][/font][/size]

WEBSITE: click here
FACEBOOK site: Minecraft Outopia Server

VOTE FOR US AND YOU WILL GET DIAMONDS INGAME…!!
THE SERVER IS RUNNING 1.3.2 BUKKIT…
Warning: The server will tend to have Lag cause its a dev build!
General things about the server!
The server was setup up about 2 months ago…
The idea of making a server was firstly came up when 3 guys decided to make a LAN server to play minecraft together.
One day, 1 guy of the 3 recommended making the server public for all.
The idea was greatful so they start upgrading the server,they gave it a name…OUTOPIA…
The Outopia Server was a dream that became true for these guys.
‘‘Tons’’ of work by them made a fabulous place for all the minecrafters…The server is still improving and attract more and more people…!!
Some Plugins that we use!
-CookieMonster: Mobs drop more stuff!
-WorldGuard: Fires don’t spread, lava doesn’t start fires, etc…
-CreativeGates: Warp gates, prettier than Sortal.-
-Essentials: Thousand of usefull and new commands waiting for you!!
-LogBlock: To find those nasty griefers…
-ChestShop: Shops allocated around the map to buy whatever you want!
-Jobs: Take a job and earn MILLIONS!!
-Factions: Make your ‘clan’…invite others…and start wars…!!
And more more that you will find when you join…!
Staff and website!
All staff recruited for Outopia have to pass a series of applications and interviews in order to make the cut. Any staff caught giving the player a hard time, wielding there power megalomaniac style or just simply not doing their job, will be dealt with in a fair manner.

Our website contains everything you need to know about the server. It also offers active forums for the players to sink their teeth into and get to know other members. The website is also the hub for all latest news, comps and events.

If you have questions or comments please let us know by typing a comment below
|
